> I tend to like final on classes.

I read, I think it was in "Ef=
fective Java" that one should either design
their classes to be extendable =
or prevent the class from being
extendable.  So if you don't intend for you=
r class to be extended then
it should be declared to be final, have all the=
 constructors private, or
